alert.note: Alert for City of Fredericksburg; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:46PM EST until January 11 at 4:30AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Rappahannock River at Fredericksburg affecting City of Fredericksburg, Spotsylvania and Stafford independent cities. For the Rappahannock River...including Remington, Fredericksburg, Fredericksburg...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rappahannock River at Fredericksburg. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Old Mill Park in Fredericksburg can no longer be accessed by car due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 14.8 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.4 feet on 04/18/2011. - Please visit weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Wed Wed Wed Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1AM 7AM 1PM Stg Time Date Rappahannock River Fredericksburg 13.0 MSG unknown 6.5 11.3 14.1 14.8 7pm Wed &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/washington or weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM EST.
